concept.title: Configuring the SSH host address
concept.shortdesc: You can set and retrieve the IP address, or addresses that can be used to connect to the appliance over SSH. You can also retrieve the IP address, or addresses that are being used by the SSH service.

conbody.p: When you connect to the appliance to use the command line, you connect over SSH. By default, you can connect over SSH to any of the IP addresses that are configured on the appliance. You can change the default by using the , or by using the command line.
